document_data.name: ''Staff of crones''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''staff of crones''''' was a [[magic]]al [[staff]] that carried within it powers to inflict disease and illness upon others.
document_data.Description: The staff itself was a shaft of rotting wood, beneath the surface of which were scores of wriggling [[worm]]s. It gave off an aura of sickness, leaving its wielder feeling unwell and nauseous.
document_data.Powers: At will, the wielder of a ''staff of crones'' could ''[[ray of sickness|emit a beam of energy]]'' that [[poison]]ed their body, an effect that continued for a matter of seconds.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Auntie Ethel]], a [[green hag]] that dwelled within her lair beneath the [[putrid bog]] of the [[Sword Coast]].
